6)å®šä¹‰APIæ¥å£

1 //å®šä¹‰APIæ¥å£
 2 //æ–°å¢æ¥å£
 3 app.post('/add', function(req, res){
 4     var movie = new Movie({//å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ¨¡å—å®ä¾‹
 5         title: req.body.title,
 6         doctor: req.body.doctor,
 7         year: req.body.year,
 8         country: req.body.country,
 9         language: req.body.language,
10         summary: req.body.summary
11     });
12     movie.save(function(err){
13         if(err){
14             console.log('ä¿å­˜å¤±è´¥');
15         }
16         console.log('ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸ');
17         res.json({ ret: 0, msg: 'succeed' });
18     });
19 });
20 //æ›´æ–°æ¥å£
21 app.post('/update', function(req, res){
22     var id = req.body.id;
23     if(id){
24         Movie.update({
25             _id: id
26         }, {
27             $set: {
28                 title: req.body.title,
29                 doctor: req.body.doctor,
30                 year: req.body.year,
31                 country: req.body.country,
32                 language: req.body.language,
33                 summary: req.body.summary
34             }
35         }, function(err){
36             if(err){
37                 console.log(err);
38                 return;
39             }
40             console.log('æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ');
41             res.json({ ret: 0, msg: 'succeed' });
42         });
43     }
44 });
45 //åˆ é™¤æ¥å£
46 app.post('/delete', function(req, res){
47     var id = req.body.id;
48     if(id){
49         Movie.remove({
50             _id: id
51         },function(err){
52             if(err){
53                 console.log(err);
54                 return;
55             }
56             console.log('åˆ é™¤æˆåŠŸ');
57             res.json({ ret: 0, msg: 'succeed' });
58         });
59     }
60 });
61 //æ ¹æ®IDè·å–å•æ¡æ•°æ®çš„æ¥å£
62 app.post('/getMovieById', function(req, res){
63     Movie.findById(req.body.id, function(err, doc){
64         res.json(doc);
65     });
66 });

3.movie.jsæ•°æ®æ“ä½œæ¨¡å—

1 var mongoose = require('mongoose');
 2 mongoose.connect('mongodb://localhost/test');//è¿æ¥åˆ°testæ•°æ®åº“
 3 var Schema = mongoose.Schema;
 4 var movieSchema = new Schema({//å®šä¹‰æ¡†æ¶
 5     title: String,
 6     doctor: String,
 7     year: Number,
 8     country: String,
 9     language: String,
10     summary: String
11 });
12 var Movie = mongoose.model('Movie', movieSchema);//å®šä¹‰æ¨¡å—
13 module.exports = Movie;//å¯¼å‡ºæ¨¡å—ï¼Œä½¿å¤–éƒ¨å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨

è¿™é‡Œè¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯å®šä¹‰æ¨¡å—çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯æ•°æ®åº“çš„åç§°ï¼Œè¿™é‡Œå¯¹åº”çš„æ•°æ®åº“åç§°æ˜¯ï¼šmoviesã€‚

29             summary: 'æé™è¿åŠ¨'

34     });
35 });

37     $.ajax({
38         url: '/delete',
